name: MMO ILY
description:
Boot up your computer and (attempt to) hang out with some friend online! Message them through an app (first or it'll break) or play your favorite MMO game with them!

You can also listen to music through an audio app, or play brick breaker, fun!

If When the game breaks you can just restart it. Click on the bottom left of the desktop to restart the game, or exit it!
